pushpawati_singhania_research_institute.name: Pushpawati Singhania Research Institute
pushpawati_singhania_research_institute.description: Pushpawati Singhania Research Institute opened its doors in 1996 and holds both NABL and NABH accreditation. It is widely recognized as the best hospital in India for gastroenterology and was the first center in South Asia—and remains a leader in the country—for medical and surgical care of digestive disorders. The institute is backed by the JK Group, one of India’s top industrial houses. Every department works together to give patients warm, skilled care and the latest in medical technology.
focus_areas: Treatment of liver, kidney, gall bladder, pancreas, and gastrointestinal tract diseases
additional_care: Gynaecology and ENT (ear, nose, and throat)

centers_of_excellence.name: Heart Institute
centers_of_excellence.description: A state-of-the-art facility for complete cardiac care. This includes interventional cardiology, cardiac surgery, and advanced diagnostics to manage and prevent heart disease.

centers_of_excellence.name: Institute of Neurosciences
centers_of_excellence.description: Specializes in treating neurological disorders with expert care in neurology, neurosurgery, spine surgery, and stroke management using cutting-edge technology.

centers_of_excellence.name: Bone & Joint Institute
centers_of_excellence.description: Provides world-class orthopedic services, including joint replacements, sports injury care, trauma surgery, and minimally invasive spine procedures.

centers_of_excellence.name: Cancer Institute
centers_of_excellence.description: A comprehensive center offering multidisciplinary cancer treatment. Services include surgical oncology, medical oncology, radiation therapy, and personalized support throughout your care journey.

centers_of_excellence.name: Division of Medical Oncology & Hematology
centers_of_excellence.description: Focuses on treating solid tumors and blood cancers. We provide chemotherapy, immunotherapy, targeted therapy, and full hematological support under the guidance of skilled oncologists.
